events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it because it is not what I expected. Please let me know how to get a refund.
The case has been assigned to the Refund cluster based on the customer's request to return the item and get money back.
Agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this customer inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you process your refund for the recent order you received.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the product has been opened or used?
My order number is 123456789. The product was opened but not used since it did not match the description.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund even if opened. Please send the item back using the prepaid label we will provide.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick response and helpful instructions for the return.
We have sent you the prepaid return label by email. Once we receive the package, the refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the prepaid label and if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
